description.en: Learn how to make equal comparisons using 'as...as' with adjectives and adverbs.
description.es: Aprende a hacer comparaciones de igualdad usando 'as...as' con adjetivos y adverbios.

prompt.es: Pablo no es tan alto como Arthur.

exercises.solution: Pablo isn't as tall as Arthur.

tip.en: The secret is balance! You need 'as' on each side of the adjective: as + adjective + as.
tip.es: ¡El secreto está en el equilibrio! Necesitas 'as' a cada lado del adjetivo: as + adjetivo + as.

tip.en: For multiples, use: number + times + as + adjective + as (e.g., twice as big as, ten times as tall as).
